title: Skins
body: is requesting 85 rp from riot too much? i need 85 rp to buy a 1350 skin and i dont want to spend $5 to get that :c

replies.body:
I'm not sure if that is too much, but you can find out if you reach out to our team in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
